documents.document: @CTVNews As he flips the middle finger at everyone
@photomeyers It would be asking too much for the Trumpet to retract his inflammatory statements about this tragedy, wouldn't it...

@MiWayHelps The new plan seems only interested in getting people into Toronto, with no regard for those trying to get around in Mississauga

@MiWayHelps My kids still can't get to their school or work on one bus since the Sept route changes. What were you thinking?!

@MiWayHelps My kid's trip to school takes 34 minutes now, of which, 24 minutes are spent walking, and TWO buses! It's crazy!
@MiWayHelps What's with the dumb route change on the 9? We can't get anywhere with 1 bus anymore!
Hey @MiWayHelps we used to be able to get from Glen Erin/Windwood to Sq One with 1 bus, now we have to transfer and the 13 is always late!
@MikeKaiser8 @CTVNews You know nothing about me

@Seneca_Blues Aw, you're #blessed 😍

@jannarden My body and I aren't exactly on speaking terms these days.

I've had one of those days that I can't quite tell if that ringing sound is just in my head or it's actual background noise...
Haven't tweeted in a while. You're all still here. Nice <3
@Filmatelist eHarmony was the biggest waste of my money. Matches were all out of country, and not even close to my age. They mock us all.

@PuckDontLie My brother took parental leave, it was the best thing ever. So grateful for the flexibility and freedoms Canada offers.
@PuckDontLie That's true... not all companies top up. It makes me sad that mothers in the US are forced back to work to just keep their jobs
@CTVNews Stories like this make me so glad to be Canadian, where this is the law, not a benefit.

@Seneca_Blues So, sleep has a name, and it's called Jennifer...?
